title: Proxmox VE Host Backup
textContent:
Proxmox VE Host Backup 
                This script serves as a versatile backup utility, enabling users to specify both the backup path and the
                directory they want to work in. This flexibility empowers users to select the specific files and
                directories
                they wish to back up, making it compatible with a wide range of hosts, not limited to Proxmox.
                Run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell, or any host.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/misc/host-backup.sh)"
                A backup is rendered ineffective when it remains stored on the host
outerHTML:
Proxmox VE Host Backup

This script serves as a versatile backup utility, enabling users to specify both the backup path and the directory they want to work in. This flexibility empowers users to select the specific files and directories they wish to back up, making it compatible with a wide range of hosts, not limited to Proxmox.

Run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell, or any host.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/misc/host-backup.sh)"

A backup is rendered ineffective when it remains stored on the host
